original_text:
and the slopes of the ravines
that lead to the settlement of Ar
    and lie along the border of Moab.”
korean_text: 모든 골짜기의 비탈은 아르 고을을 향하여 기울어지고 모압의 경계에 닿았도다 하였더라

sentences.original_text: and the slopes of the ravines
that lead to the settlement of Ar
and lie along the border of Moab
